XML-RPC¶

Although not bulletproof, there is some XML-RPC support built in to Bambu Blog. The server is supplied by Bambu XML-RPC.

It exposes endpoints that support the metaWeblog and Blogger XML-RPC interfaces.

bambu_blog.xmlrpc.delete_post(*args, **kwargs)¶

The metaWeblog.deletePost handler (also conforms to blogger.deletePost)

bambu_blog.xmlrpc.edit_post(*args, **kwargs)¶

The metaWeblog.editPost handler

bambu_blog.xmlrpc.get_blogs(appkey, username, password)¶

The blogger.getUserInfo handler

bambu_blog.xmlrpc.get_categories(blogid, username, password)¶

The metaWeblog.getCategories handler

bambu_blog.xmlrpc.get_post(postid, username, password)¶

The metaWeblog.getPost handler

bambu_blog.xmlrpc.get_posts(blogid, username, password, numberOfPosts=10)¶

The metaWeblog.getRecentPosts handler

bambu_blog.xmlrpc.new_post(*args, **kwargs)¶

The metaWeblog.newPost handler

bambu_blog.xmlrpc.upload_media(*args, **kwargs)¶

The metaWeblog.newMediaObject handler
